soulWeapon.advancement0: Summons the soul of Aurelian Whisper, Goldbreeze for 10 sec, increasing ATK Spd of all allies by 300, dealing ??? M.DMG to all enemies, and increasing M.DMG they take 25% for 10 sec. Upon this Skill at the Arena, inflicts Charm to all enemies for 5 sec.

soulWeapon.advancement2: Upon activation, recovers Mana of all allies by 2000 and increases Crit DMG by 80% for the duration of Skill.
soulWeapon.activation: Charges up upon using Skills 4 times.

profile.dislikes: Nasty customers Greasy hair Bad odor

background.story: She's the owner of 'Gold Bar,' the biggest and the most luxurious tavern in Vespia. Beneath its flashy exterior, the tavern actually serves as a secret meeting place for the social elites, where invaluable secret information is constantly exchanged. Her natural charm and conversation skills can easily break down personal barriers and win the trust of others. Her true identity is a dealer of secret information and weapons.

itemIntroductions.weapon: Cassandra works double as an arms dealer. One day, a stolen item came into her possession which immediately caught her attention. It was a beautiful fan adorned with gold decorations and precious gems. According to the rumors, every single lady who possessed this fan soon fell into great misfortune. It has been circulating the market as a cursed item. As soon as she bought it, Cassandra began investigating its origin. As it turned out, this fan, named Goldbreeze, had been created to serve as a concealed weapon. It shouldn't be too hard to guess as to what kind of misfortune the unaware owners of this fan might have suffered.
itemIntroductions.soul:
Goldbreeze is a beautiful fan that hides its fatal side. It was used by many noblewomen to resolve their desire, envy, and jealousy.
In the process, Goldbreeze was soaked in the blood of many and was feared as a cursed fan that harms its master.

Howver, its fate took a turn when Cassandra purchased the fan from a junk shop.
Cassandra was beautiful and fatal as the fan, and she didn't treat Goldbreeze as a tool to show off or for vanity.
Cassandra sometimes used the fan elegantly, sometimes sharply, and sometimes boldly. Among those who faced Cassandra with her fan, some became slaves to her beauty, some became regular customers, and some fell to her feet.

Eventually Goldbreeze acknowledged Cassandra's ability and showed herself-- A beautiful noblewomen whose face is covered with a mask... One could never imagine that it was the true form of a fatal weapon that harmed hundreds of lives.

But Cassandra knew more than anyone that the prettier the rose, the sharper its thorns.
treasures: A decoration made with a feather of the Crimson Bird, a beautiful yet dangerous evil beast. The feather usually exudes dark energy, but it illuminates the surrounding area with a red glow when exposed to light. The color is too splendid and brilliant for feeble minds to escape the hallucination it creates.

A luxurious accessory made by the greatest jeweler in the continent. A limited edition ornament created by jeweler Larik. Any person in high society on the Orbis Continent would love to have one. His work is said to be the epitome of art, and it is said to heal and grant courage. There are only 3 of the limited edition Fancy Ornaments, and one of them obviously belongs to the master of the Gold Bar.

A legendary gold flame necklace pendant. The legendary Gold King made this gold flame necklace pendant to get the attention of the Goddess of Love and Beauty. Its gold scent creates a Tempting Wave that makes anyone join their side and be loved by everyone.

A reed diffuser that Cassandra bought at a black market merchant from the east. It has a strong scent of azalea. The liquid inside contains a special substance that stirs people's minds, and those who smelt it for an extended period time would confess their deepest secrets. Unless there is a dire need of information, Cassandra does not use the diffuser because it is nearly impossible to buy it again.
